description: First of all, I'm really sorry how long it took to get this done! The rewrite got out of hand and the extension is now a small application with tons of useful features :)
I specifically focused on making it as small and as fast as possible. If you are interested in technologies used, visit the extension repository.
Below are some key changes that might be of interest to you:
new: Now runs in all popped out or embedded chats, including the one in your dashboard.
Search bar. Write "!" to view only unchecked people.
Custom ignore list. See Configuration section.
changed: User list implements binary search sorting, and occlusion culling, which means the speed of its rendering and scrolling is the same when there is 10 or 10,000 people.
removed: No longer possible to load the whole list of people in chat. They have to write something to be registered by extension.
